[Anne]124-anne went to [the little Avonlea graveyard]1990-the little avonlea graveyard the next evening to put fresh flowers on [[Matthew]107-matthew 's grave]4130-matthew 's grave and water the Scotch rosebush . [She]124-anne lingered there until dusk , liking the peace and calm of [the little place]1992-the little place , with [its]1992-the little place poplars whose rustle was like low , friendly speech , and its whispering grasses growing at will among the graves . When [she]124-anne finally left [it]1990-the little avonlea graveyard and walked down the long hill that sloped to [the Lake of [Shining Waters]25-shining waters]2236-the lake of shining waters it was past sunset and [all Avonlea]2-avonlea lay before [her]124-anne in a dreamlike afterlight--"a haunt of ancient peace . "[124-anne] There was a freshness in the air as of a wind that had blown over honey - sweet fields of clover . Home lights twinkled out here and there among [the homestead]1994-the homestead trees . Beyond lay [the sea]609-the sea , misty and purple , with its haunting , unceasing murmur . [The west]1996-the west was a glory of soft mingled hues , and [the pond]501-the pond reflected them all in still softer shadings . The beauty of [it]1998-it all thrilled [Anne]124-anne 's heart , and [she]124-anne gratefully opened the gates of [her]124-anne soul to it .

" [Dear old world]4218-dear old world , "[124-anne] [she]124-anne murmured , " [you]4218-dear old world are very lovely , and [I]124-anne am glad to be alive in [you]4218-dear old world . "[124-anne]

Halfway down [the hill]357-the hill [a tall lad]2000-a tall lad came whistling out of a gate before [the Blythe homestead]2001-the blythe homestead . It was [Gilbert]140-gilbert , and the whistle died on [his]140-gilbert lips as [he]140-gilbert recognized [Anne]124-anne . [He]140-gilbert lifted [his]140-gilbert cap courteously , but [he]140-gilbert would have passed on in silence , if [Anne]124-anne had not stopped and held out [her]124-anne hand .

" [Gilbert]4219-gilbert , "[124-anne] [she]124-anne said , with scarlet cheeks , " [I]124-anne want to thank [you]4219-gilbert for giving up [the school]867-the school for [me]124-anne . [Gilbert]140-gilbert took the offered hand eagerly .

" It was n't particularly good of [me]140-gilbert at all , [Anne]124-anne . [I]140-gilbert was pleased to be able to do [you]124-anne some small service . " [I]140-gilbert forgave [you]4219-gilbert that day by [the pond landing]4223-the pond landing , although [I]140-gilbert did n't know it . What a stubborn little goose [I]140-gilbert was . " [We]4221-we are going to be [the best of friends]1349-the best of friends , "[140-gilbert] said [Gilbert]140-gilbert , jubilantly . [Marilla]113-marilla looked curiously at [Anne]124-anne when [the latter]414-the latter entered [the kitchen]557-the kitchen .

" Who was that came up [the lane]380-the lane with [you]124-anne , [Anne]124-anne ? "[140-gilbert]

" [Gilbert Blythe]140-gilbert , "[124-anne] answered [Anne]124-anne , vexed to find [herself]124-anne blushing . " [I]124-anne met [him]140-gilbert on [[Barry]120-diana 's hill]4228-barry 's hill . "[124-anne]

" [I]113-marilla did n't think [you]124-anne and [Gilbert Blythe]140-gilbert were such good friends that [you]124-anne 'd stand for half an hour at the gate talking to [him]140-gilbert , "[113-marilla] said [Marilla]113-marilla with a dry smile .

" [We]4229-we have n't been -- [we've]4229-we been [good enemies]4230-good enemies . But [we]4229-we have decided that it will be much more sensible to be [good friends]3692-good friends in the future . Were [we]4229-we really there half an hour ? It seemed just a few minutes . But , [you]124-anne see , [we]4229-we have five years ' lost conversations to catch up with , [Marilla]113-marilla . "[124-anne]

[Anne]124-anne sat long at [her]124-anne window that night companioned by a glad content . The wind purred softly in the cherry boughs , and the mint breaths came up to [her]124-anne . The stars twinkled over the pointed firs in [the hollow]342-the hollow and [Diana]120-diana 's light gleamed through the old gap .

[[Anne]124-anne 's horizons]2005-anne 's horizons had closed in since the night [she]124-anne had sat [there]348-there after coming [home]361-home from [Queen 's]128-queen 's ; but if the path set before [her]124-anne feet was to be narrow [she]124-anne knew that flowers of quiet happiness would bloom along it . The joy of sincere work and worthy aspiration and congenial friendship were to be [hers]124-anne ; nothing could rob [her]124-anne of [her]124-anne birthright of fancy or [her]124-anne ideal world of dreams . And there was always the bend in [the road]413-the road !

" ? [God]145-god 's in [[his]145-god heaven]4232-his heaven , all 's right with [the world]409-the world , ' "[124-anne] whispered [Anne]124-anne softly .
